title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 31 August 2016 - XWiki
content:

10:38 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:38 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:40 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: good morning, you may want to check http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-rendering/  
10:40 <vmassol> there are 3 failing tests  
10:42 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: and also http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-commons-7.4.x/58/console  
10:42 <vmassol> [ERROR] /home/hudsonagent/jenkins\_root/workspace/xwiki-commons-7.4.x/xwiki-commons-core/xwiki-commons-xml/src/main/java/org/xwiki/xml/internal/html/filter/LinkFilter.java:[103,52] cannot find symbol  
10:50 <vmassol> mflorea: it might be more interesting to introduce a new common hbm no?  
10:50 <vmassol> (and add it to xwiki.hibernate.cfg.vm)  
10:50 <vmassol> and a warning in the RN  
10:50 <vmassol> (since existing users may not update their hibenrate.cfg file)  
10:50 <vmassol> that's a lot of dup :)  
10:51 <mflorea> there's a lot of duplication even without my addition, but I agree  
10:52 <vmassol> btw did you make sure it works on those DBs? (at least for some)  
10:52 <vmassol> yes but these are really common common  
10:52 <vmassol> it's harder to share a table when only 1 field has a change  
10:53 <mflorea> msmeria is helping me with testing on various DBs (mysql, oracle and postgresql)  
10:53 <vmassol> cool  
10:54 <vmassol> for DB2 or other dbs we could ask for testers on the list  
10:54 <mflorea> if there are differences we may have to create DB-specific mapping files like in the case of xwiki.hbm.xml  
10:55 <mflorea> but for the moment the mapping is common so I'll move it in a separate file  
11:00 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
11:01 <vmassol> yep, ok  
11:02 <msmeria> has quit  
11:10 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: I'm going to look at it  
11:33 <gdelhumeau> damn, I've backported some code that needs java8  
11:34 <gdelhumeau> do we have an equivalent of String.join(.., ..) in some StringTools in XWiki?  
11:34 <vmassol> yes  
11:34 <vmassol> StringUtils.join  
11:34 <vmassol> (gdelhumeau)  
11:39 <gdelhumeau> thx  
11:39 <vmassol> (reverting the vote as per nico's request)  
11:54 <vmassol> guys I'm having a hard time finding out why in jira for contrib project, e.g. http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/MARKDOWN-12, I don't see the custom "Test" field. It's using the same field scheme as for commons for example.  
11:54 <vmassol> any idea?  
13:22 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
13:26 <msmeria1> has quit  
13:31 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: I see a non-released xwiki artifacts on https://oss.sonatype.org/#stagingRepositories  
13:31 <vmassol> version 8.3M1  
13:31 <vmassol> maybe you didn't finish the process?  
13:38 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
14:04 <gdelhumeau> indeed I need to finish it, but you know, I had problem doing it from my computer  
14:04 <gdelhumeau> with some pom.xml that was empty when maven download them  
14:04 <gdelhumeau> \*it  
14:04 <gdelhumeau> you can even drop my non-released artifacts  
14:08 <gdelhumeau> apparently, a link to an attachement is considered as external in rendering  
14:15 <woshilapin> Hi devs here, don't know if you know but congrats, you just had a blog post on Korben.info about Cryptpad \o/  
14:37 <vmassol> woshilapin: yep, that's nice :)  
14:37 <vmassol> (in meeting)  
14:43 <acotiuga> Hello, I'm trying to use https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-extension/xwiki-platform-extension-script/src/main/java/org/xwiki/extension/script/InstalledExtensionScriptService.java#L116 for a installed extension (fullcalendar) but is not working with the String parameter. I tried with both id: org.xwiki.contrib:macro-fullcalendar and feature: vincentmassol:fullcalendar-application. Any idea why this is not worki  
14:45 <tmortagne> acotiuga: you will need to be more specific than "not working" :)  
14:46 <tmortagne> are you sure you have an extension that depend on org.xwiki.contrib:macro-fullcalendar ?  
14:46 <acotiuga> it displays $services.extension.installed.getBackwardDependencies('org.xwiki.contrib:macro-fullcalendar')  
14:46 <acotiuga> is meeting application which is also installed  
14:47 <tmortagne> also getBackwardDependencies(String feature) only look at root namespace  
14:47 <tmortagne> is it installed on root namespace ?  
14:47 <tmortagne> if it's not you should either use the ExtensionId signature or indicate in which namespace you extension is used  
14:49 <tmortagne> getBackwardDependencies return null when there is an error in which case you can get the error with getLastError()  
14:50 <tmortagne> ha no actually null in this method just mean it does not exist, seterror is used in others  
14:50 <tmortagne> so use the other signatures  
15:20 <gdelhumeau> About http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-rendering/lastBuild/org.xwiki.rendering$xwiki-rendering-syntax-html/testReport/org.xwiki.rendering.test.cts/RenderingTest/simple\_link\_link3\_\_html\_4\_01\_\_IN\_\_in\_txt\_\_CTS\_\_inout\_xml\_/  
15:21 <gdelhumeau> I don't understand how my change inside AbstractXHTMLLinkTypeRenderer#beginLink could change the "freestanding" parameter  
15:21 <gdelhumeau> and it does not explain why the attachment URL is now suddenly considered as an external URL  
15:24 <Enygma`> has quit  
15:25 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki
